name: ecma6
description: Ecma6 new features added - Modifications to ES5 (2009) - New features such as classes and inheritance, let and const, Bug fixes and patch fixes over the previous ECMA version , ECMA is the standard descriptions followed for scripting languages such as javaScript, AScript. New data structure introduction - Map, NewMap, iterators, generators, Prmoises.
author: Nikhil Bhaskar
